description_prompts: Contains the descriptions that are propagated to the users of the tools, providing a synopsis of the capabilities and the method of interaction.
orchestrator_prompts: Contains the prompts provided to the orchestrating agent, so that the orchestrating agent knows the capabilities of the agents it is managing.
system_prompts: Contains the system prompts for the agent.
orchestration_message_prompts: Contains the second part of the system prompt for the agents that orchestrator other agents. This goes after the prompt associated for them in orchestrator_prompts and the agents orchestrator_prompts for the agents it manages.
